name: orchestkit
description: The Complete AI Development Toolkit - 196 skills, 35 agents, 120 hooks for full-stack development

plugins.name: ork-core
plugins.description: Core OrchestKit foundation — essential skills, agents, and hooks. Context engineering, architecture decisions, project structure. Required for all other OrchestKit plugins.

plugins.name: ork-memory-graph
plugins.description: Knowledge graph memory — zero-config, always works. Graph-first architecture with remember, recall, and session context loading.

plugins.name: ork-memory-mem0
plugins.description: Mem0 cloud memory — semantic search, cross-session sync, analytics. Requires MEM0_API_KEY. Depends on ork-memory-graph.

plugins.name: ork-memory-fabric
plugins.description: Memory orchestration — parallel query dispatch, cross-reference boosting, deduplication across graph and mem0. Depends on ork-memory-graph.

plugins.name: ork-rag
plugins.description: RAG & Retrieval — retrieval, embeddings, contextual, HyDE, reranking, query-decomposition, agentic-rag, multimodal-rag, pgvector-search, semantic-caching

plugins.name: ork-langgraph
plugins.description: LangGraph & Agent Orchestration — state, routing, parallel, checkpoints, functional, supervisor, human-in-loop, multi-agent, agent-loops, frameworks, temporal

plugins.name: ork-llm
plugins.description: LLM Patterns — function-calling, prompt-engineering, streaming, testing, safety, caching, fine-tuning, vision, audio, inference, ollama

plugins.name: ork-ai-observability
plugins.description: AI Observability — langfuse-observability, cache-cost-tracking, evidence-verification

plugins.name: ork-evaluation
plugins.description: Evaluation patterns — llm-evaluation, golden-dataset-curation, golden-dataset-management, golden-dataset-validation, add-golden

plugins.name: ork-product
plugins.description: Product Management agents — product-strategist, business-case-builder, prioritization-analyst, market-intelligence

plugins.name: ork-api
plugins.description: API Design — FastAPI, GraphQL (Strawberry), REST patterns, streaming, versioning, rate-limiting, error-handling

plugins.name: ork-database
plugins.description: Database patterns — sqlalchemy-2-async, alembic-migrations, database-schema-designer, database-versioning, zero-downtime-migration, connection-pooling

plugins.name: ork-async
plugins.description: Async & Tasks — asyncio-advanced, background-jobs, celery-advanced, distributed-locks, resilience-patterns

plugins.name: ork-backend-patterns
plugins.description: Backend Architecture — clean-architecture, DDD, CQRS, event-sourcing, sagas, aggregates, outbox, idempotency, caching, gRPC

plugins.name: ork-react-core
plugins.description: React Core patterns — react-server-components-framework, form-state-patterns, zustand-patterns, tanstack-query-advanced, react-aria-patterns, type-safety-validation

plugins.name: ork-ui-design
plugins.description: UI & Design patterns — design-system-starter, shadcn-patterns, radix-primitives, motion-animation-patterns, i18n-date-patterns

plugins.name: ork-frontend
plugins.description: Frontend Patterns — PWA, view-transitions, scroll-animations, responsive, dashboard, performance, render, lazy-loading, image-optimization, core-web-vitals, vite

plugins.name: ork-testing
plugins.description: Testing — unit, integration, property-based, e2e, webapp, MSW, VCR, contract, test-data, standards, pytest

plugins.name: ork-security
plugins.description: Security patterns — owasp-top-10, auth-patterns, input-validation, defense-in-depth, security-scanning, advanced-guardrails

plugins.name: ork-devops
plugins.description: DevOps & Infrastructure — deployment, monitoring, performance-testing, release-management, github-operations, edge-computing

plugins.name: ork-git
plugins.description: Git/GitHub patterns — git-workflow, git-recovery-command, create-pr, fix-issue, issue-progress-tracking, stacked-prs

plugins.name: ork-accessibility
plugins.description: Accessibility patterns — wcag-compliance, a11y-testing, focus-management

plugins.name: ork-workflows
plugins.description: Workflows — implement, explore, verify, review-pr, code-review-playbook, skill-evolution, feedback, worktree-coordination

plugins.name: ork-mcp
plugins.description: MCP Integration — mcp-server-building, mcp-advanced-patterns, mcp-security-hardening, agent-browser, browser-content-capture

plugins.name: ork-video
plugins.description: Video & Demo Production — demo-producer, remotion, manim, terminal-recording, storyboarding, narration, HeyGen avatars, audio mixing

plugins.name: ork
plugins.description: Complete AI development toolkit with 196 skills covering AI/LLM, backend, frontend, security, and testing patterns. Includes 35 specialized agents and 120 lifecycle hooks.
